Helswingi
20192018

Helswingi is an authentic swing dance festival in Helsinki, Finland. It brings together fantastic jazz bands, wonderful people and heavenly dances.



Memories 2019

Event photos: Nuria Aguade Fotografia - www.nuriaaguade.com
Photobooth photos: Essi Orpana - www.essiorpana.com

More photos: www.facebook.com/pg/helswingi/photos/?tab=albums
Videos: YouTube - Helswingi 2019
Archived site: 2019.helswingi.fi


Memories 2018

Event photos: Eric Bobrie, For Dancers Only - www.ebobrie.com
Photobooth photos: Essi Orpana - www.essiorpana.com

More photos: www.facebook.com/pg/helswingi/photos/?tab=albums
Videos: YouTube - Helswingi 2018
Archived site: 2018.helswingi.fi

Helswingi is organized by Black Pepper Swing.

Helswingi is an authentic swing dance festival in Helsinki, Finland. It brings together fantastic jazz bands, wonderful people and heavenly dances.
